target.name: build
target.description: Builds platform

target.name: deploy
target.description: Deploys platform

target.name: all
target.description: Builds and deploys

target.name: clean
target.description: Cleans platform and all extensions

target.name: cleancomplete
target.description: Cleans 'normally' and in addition clean database, eclipsebin and mediaweb

target.name: cleandeploy
target.description: Cleans deployment

target.name: gensource
target.description: Generates missing sources (e.g. Generated*.java) for all extensions. after calling that you can refresh your development environment.

target.name: jspcompile
target.description: Compiles all jsps even if it is disabled for normal build

target.name: log4j
target.description: Updates the log4j properties (copy to appserver)

target.name: extgen
target.description: Runs extgen with settings from extgen/project.properties

target.name: yunit
target.description: Runs non-hybris JUnit tests; that is, all JUnit tests located at 'testsrc' folder of an extensions having not package 'de.hybris.platform'

target.name: yunitall
target.description: Runs all JUnit tests; that is, all JUnit tests located at 'testsrc' folder of an extensions

target.name: yunitweb
target.description: Runs non-hybris JUnit web tests; that is, all JUnit tests located at 'web/testsrc' folder of an extensions having not package 'de.hybris.platform'

target.name: yunitweball
target.description: Runs all JUnit web tests; that is, all JUnit tests located at 'web/testsrc' folder of an extensions

target.name: yunitinit
target.description: Initializes JUnit tenant

target.name: customize
target.description: Copies the file content from '/config/customize' folder to '/bin' folder recursivley

target.name: jhat
target.description: Connects to running tomcat, creates a heap dump file (ant jmap) and start jhat webserver on port 7000 to analyze dump

target.name: jmap
target.description: Connects to running tomcat, and creates a heap dump file

echo.message: generating dump from VM pid ${pid} to ${HYBRIS_TEMP_DIR}/jhat-heap.hprof
\n*** WARNING, THIS WILL OVERRIDE THE OLD FILE **\n
Export will start in 10sec. Press CTRL-C to abort

target.name: perf
target.description: Runs a SciMark2 performance test. This is a Java numerical benchmark measuring performance of computational kernels for FFTs, Monte Carlo simulation, sparse matrix computations, Jacobi SOR, and dense LU matrix factorizations.

target.name: udpsniff
target.description: Sniffs for UDP messages in the current cluster

target.name: initialize
target.description: Runs an initialization of the specified tenant in stand-alone mode, using hybris Administration Console default settings. Syntax: ant initialize [-Dtenant].

target.name: runcronjob
target.description: Performs a cronjob in stand-alone mode. Syntax: ant runcronjob [-Dcronjob] [-Dtenant]. Use -Dcronjob to pass a CronJob code, such as -Dcronjob=MyCronJob. Use quotation marks for CronJob codes with spaces, such as -Dcronjob="My Cron Job".

target.name: clearclusternodes
target.description: clears all stored tcp cluster nodes in the meta information table including the current node.

target.name: updatesystem
target.description: Performs an update system on master tenant
